definition: (used of count nouns) every one considered individually, to or from every one of two or more (considered individually)
details:
adjective
- (used of count nouns) every one considered individually
adverb
- to or from every one of two or more (considered individually)
= example: to or from every one of two or more (considered individually)
= synonyms: to each one, for each one, from each one, apiece
